title: GIANMARCO GARCIA CURO (0000-0001-6685-3207) - ORCID | Connecting Research and Researchers

biography.value: Systems Engineer, Master's degree in information and communication technology management. Graduated from the National University of Huancavelica, Professional School of Systems Engineering. ICT Management Diploma. Specialist in Design Thinking Centrum PUCP. Certified Specialist in Creating a Journal in OJS 3, Becoming an Editor, Becoming a Reviewer by PKP-OJS Canada - USA. Clarivate Blind Peer Reviewer, Good dating behavior, Review in the sciences, Introduction to peer review. Specialist in management and administration of Scientific Journals and Institutional Repositories. CLOUD Amazon and GIGAS server specialist. Member of the American Chemical Society (ACS). SGS Academy Interpretation of the ISO 9001:2015 Standard. RENACYT Level V Researcher.
